import React from 'react' import html from '../assets/html.png' import css from '../assets/css.png' import bootstrap from '../assets/bootstrap.png' import javascript from '../assets/javascript.png' import react from '../assets/react.png' const Experience = () => { const techs = [ { id: 1, src: html, title: 'HTML', style: 'shadow-orange-500', }, { id: 2, src: css, title: 'CSS', style: 'shadow-blue-500', }, { id: 3, src: bootstrap, title: 'BootStrap', style: 'shadow-purple-500', }, { id: 4, src: javascript, title: 'JavaScript', style: 'shadow-yellow-500' }, { id: 5, src: react, title: 'React', style: 'shadow-blue-600' } ] return (

Experience

These are the technologies i worked with

{ techs.map(({ id, src, title, style }) => (

{title}

)) }
) } export default Experience
